links.label: Old Time Radio Program Logs By Frank Passage and Others

infos.info: Sound Effects: Ed Blainey; - Series was based on the character created by Dashiell Hammett. - ------------------------------------------------ - Opening: - WOMAN: There he goes . . . into that drugstore. He's stepping on the scales. - SOUND: Clink of a coin. - WOMAN: Weigh . . . two hundred and thirty-seven pounds. - SOUND: Card dropping - WOMAN: Fortune . . . danger! - MUSIC: Sting - WOMAN: Whoooo is it? - MAN: The Fat Man! - Source: Buxton and Owen, ' The Big Broadcast: 1920-1950'
